titles.title: Wherever I am, I'll praise Him,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Wherever I am, I'll praise Him,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Whenever I can, I'll praise Him,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: For His love surrounds me like the sea;

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I'll praise the name of Jesus,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Lift up the name of Jesus

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: For the name of Jesus lifted me.
